DOC.brief_summary: This study is a 6-month, multicenter, randomized study to assess the effect of daily SMS reminders sent during 3 months in the adherence to oral antipsychotic treatment in stabilized outpatients with schizophrenia.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Daily Short Message System (SMS) Reminders on Medication Adherence to Oral Antipsychotics in Patients With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Male or female patients older than 18 years With a diagnosis of schizophrenia (DSMIV TR criteria) Stabilized outpatients Under oral antipsychotic monotherapy Administration of a depot antipsychotic drug Suicide risk
